channel.title: Augustus - Developers
channel.description:
Augustus is looking for trusty programmers. We can't pay cash yet. We're aiming to build and get up an powerful popular server. All ranks and credits will be given.
So, if you want to work on that great project, please fill in this form and comment below. [code] First and Last Name: Date of Birth: Time Zone: Past experience in working with Private Servers: Past experience with RuneScape Private Servers: Which Languages other than Java do you know: Examples of your work: Which side you can develop (Client, Server, Stability, Content, All): Other than Private Server Development, please list your capabilities: How can we contact you: [/code]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5DTNnjhs5p8]Augustus's Login/Lobby - YouTube[/url]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zs1Xr.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5g5eb.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/kqVX0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Qypo4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/l4Sbj.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gX62F.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/LlO7E.jpg[/img][/code]

item.title: Augustus - Developers
item.dc:creator: @jesteampro jesteampro
item.description:
@jesteampro wrote:

First and Last Name: Jessee Lefebvre

Date of Birth: 31 december 1996

Time Zone: GMT -5

Past experience in working with Private Servers: I always been working solo but I’d like to go with someone for once :D. I made by myself HeroZcape and its currently running on my VPS.

Past experience with RuneScape Private Servers: I made alot of servers but HeroZcape is the only one that I’ve been putting online.

Which Languages other than Java do you know: C++ basics and a bit CSS and javaScript because I did most of my server website

Examples of your work: www.herozcape.ucoz.com

Which side you can develop (Client, Server, Stability, Content, All): Mostly Server

Other than Private Server Development, please list your capabilities: Umm well Idk xD, I can set up minecraft servers on linux or portforwarding most types of routers since some of my friends wanted a minecraft server so I portforwarded those that wanted…

How can we contact you: On skype (my skype account is jessee.lefebvre), but no mic :S will be buying one soon.

Thx for reading

Read full topic
